details: Can be stacked up to 5 times, once for each unique Cygnus Knight to reach Master Level

info: To create one, choose the 'Cygnus Knights' option in the Character Creation screen and then continue through the story until you reach Lv. 10 and Ereve. You will see 5 NPCs on the left after talking to Neinheart. Talk to Hawkeye to become a Thunder Breaker

details: All 1st to 4th Job skills can be maxed
Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

hyperBuild.recommended:
• Gale - Extra Strike
  • Thunderbolt - Reinforce and Extra Strike
  • Annihilate - Reinforce and Boss Rush

nodeInfo.recommended:
Primary Trio
Secondary Trio
  • Any combination of these skills are good but preferred from same category as you want to max primary first
  • 4 Boost Nodes total are needed to reach Master Level 60 for these skills (with Matrix Points used)
    • Nodes with the same Main Skill (skill at the top) cannot be equipped at the same time

extraContent.title: Linking & Link Mastery Skills
extraContent.content:
Thunder Breaker's attacks can link with one another to decrease the cast action delays between each skill. Successfully linking skills will also provide buffs such as Lightning Elemental (1st Job) that provide provings a stacking %Ignore DEF and %Damage buff. In 3rd Job, Link Mastery is unlocked that provides a stacking %Final Damage buff upon linking skills

Additionally, certain skills are labelled as 'Link Mastery' skills which are attacks that have cooldowns. Several of these skills consume stacks of Lightning Elemental. Primarily, these skills are affected by the buff Primal Bolt (Hyper Skill) which allows Link Mastery skills to not consume any Lightning Elemental stacks and linking skills will reduce the cooldown of these skills. Below is a list of all Link Mastery skills:

  • Sea Wave - 2nd Job
  • Gale - 3rd Job
  • Shark Torpedo - 5th Job
  • Lightning God Spear Strike - 5th Job

primary.name: Elemental Slash
primary.shortDesc: Damage: 130%, Max Enemies Hit: 3, Max Hits: 1

primary.name: Imperial Recall
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, return to Ereve immediately.\nCooldown: 600 sec.

primary.name: Noble Mind
primary.shortDesc: Increases Empress's Blessing max level by 6
details: This skill is leveled up by completing quests from Neinheart after Lv. 125

primary.name: Elemental Harmony
primary.shortDesc: Strength increases 1 for every 2 levels the character gains

primary.name: Elemental Expert
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power and Magic ATT: +10%

primary.name: Elemental Shift
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 4, jumps further in the appropriate direction
details: Can be activated by pressing jump twice
While in the air, pressing the Up Arrow and Jump Key will perform a vertical jump

primary.name: Hero's Echo
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, increases Attack Power & Magic ATT by 4% for 2400 sec\nCooldown: 300 sec
details: Affects all nearby players

primary.name: Lightning Punch
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 21, Max Enemies Hit: 4, Damage: 160%, Number of Attacks: 2
details: When used first, can be linked with all skills except

primary.name: Flash
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 9, Max Enemies Hit: 4 Damage: 310%, Number of Attacks: 1\nWhen no enemies are around, you'll be teleported forward 300.
primary.desc: Teleport to the nearest enemy and damages surrounding enemies
details: If there are no enemies, teleports forward a short distance
When used first, can be linked with all skills except
Cast action cannot be cancelled when linked to while mid-air

primary.name: Lightning Elemental
primary.shortDesc:
Chance to create Lightning Charge: 10%, Buff Duration: 30 sec
Same chance to create 2 Lightning Charge when linking skill
Max Lightning Charge Stacks: 2
Ignore Enemy Defense: 5% per Lightning Charge
Consuming Lightning Charge temporarily applies adjusted buff for 10 sec that increases the same amount of stats as those increased by the consumed Lightning Charge
While adjusted buff is active, adjusted buff stacks decrease when Lightning Charge is obtained
All stats increased by Lightning Charge and adjusted buff are additive.
primary.desc: While toggled, your attacks have a chance to provide a stack of 'Lightning Charge'
details: [Lightning Charge]: For each stack, increases %Ignore DEF (additive)
Linking skills has a chance to provide 2 stacks of Lightning Charge

When stacks of Lightning Charge are consumed, a temporary buff is applied that provides the same amount of bonus stats provided from the Lightning Charges consumed
  • While active, the amount of bonus stats provided will be adjusted as Lightning Charges are regained

primary.name: Electrified
primary.shortDesc: Chance to create Lightning Charge: +20%\nSpeed: +40, Jump: +20, Max Speed: +20.
details: Increases chance to gain Lightning Charges
Now increases Movement Speed, Jump and Max Movement Speed
Additionally modifies the appearance of

primary.name: Shark Sweep
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 31, Damage: 155%, Number of Attacks: 4, Max Enemies Hit: 6
primary.desc: Sweep upwards damaging enemies around you
details: When used first, can be linked with all skills except

primary.name: Tidal Crash
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Max Monsters Hit: 8, Damage: 255%, Number of Attacks: 2 while moving forward
primary.desc: Dash forward while pushing enemies back
details: Does not generate Lightning Charges
While dashing, pressing the Down Arrow Key will cancel the dash early

Right-clicking the skill will toggle a lock ON/OFF to prevent it from cancelling with the Arrow Keys
  • Instead, pressing the Skill Key again will cancel the dash early

When used first, can be linked with all skills except
  • Certain skills can link to Tidal Crash faster
  • Can be used to cancel cast actions when used after a skill while mid-air

primary.name: Sea Wave
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 50, created when linking skill and not under cooldown
Flows in a fixed direction, Max Enemies Hit: 5, Damage: 190%, Number of Attacks: 4
Disappears when moving a distance of 2700 or the number of enemies attacked is 24
Max Attack on Single Enemy: 1
Cooldown: 12 sec
primary.desc: When linking skills, periodically creates a rolling wave that damages enemies it collides with
details: The wave will disappear after travelling a fixed distance or after a number of attacks
Right-clicking the skill will toggle activation ON/OFF to prevent Sea Wave from activating
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Agile Knuckles
primary.shortDesc: Strenght: +20, Knuckle Attack Speed: +2

primary.name: Knuckle Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Knuckle Mastery: +50%, Final Damage: +5%

primary.name: Gains
primary.shortDesc: Permanent STR: +60, Critical Rate: +15%, Critical Damage: +5%

primary.name: Lightning Boost
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power: +20\nLightning Charge Chance: +20%, Max Stacks: +1\nDamage: +2% per Lightning Charge, damage increased from Lightning Charge is additive
details: Increases chance to gain Lightning Charges
Increases max stacks of Lightning Charges (up to 3)
Lightning Charge now grants %Damage for each stack
Grants flat Attack

primary.name: Ascension
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 41, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 225%, Number of Attacks: 5
primary.desc: Leap up into the air, launching a shark from the ground
details: When used first, can be linked with all skills except

primary.name: Thunder
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 37, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 170%, Number of Attacks: 4
primary.desc: Dive diagonally downwards towards the ground
details: Can only be used in the air or after
When used first, can be linked with all skills
Cast action cannot be cancelled when linked into while mid-air

primary.name: Gale
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 65, can be used when Lightning Charge stack is 3
Uses all Lightning Charge stacks, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 381%, Number of Attacks: 3. When used at max Lightning Charge stacks, Damage: +40% points
Damage: +2% per Lightning Charge used, Buff Duration: 60 sec
However, this skill doesn't generate Lightning Charges.
Cooldown: 20 sec
primary.desc: Unleashes a powerful whirlwind in front of you
details:
Consumes all stacks of Lightning Charge
  • Can only be used when you have 3 or more stacks
  • If attack consumed max stacks of Lightning Charge, the attack deals increased %p Damage
  • Attack does not generate stacks of Lightning Charge
Grants a %Damage buff based on how many stacks of Lightning Charge were consumed
When used first, can be linked with all skills except
Cast action cannot be cancelled when linked into while mid-air

primary.name: Seawall
primary.shortDesc: Abnormal Status Resistance: +30, Elemental Resistance: +30%

primary.name: Ironclad
primary.shortDesc: Damage: +5%, Critical Rate: +10%\nDamage Taken: -10%, Knockback Resistance: +40%

primary.name: Link Mastery
primary.shortDesc: When linked skill hits, increases Final Damage by 6% for 30 sec. Link Mastery stacks up to 3 times and the Final Damage increase from Link Mastery is additive
primary.desc: Successfully linking skills provides a stacking %Final Damage buff (additive)

primary.name: Lightning Lord
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power: +30, Critical Damage: +10%\nLightning Charge Chance: +30%, Max Charges: +1\nDamage: +3% per Lightning Charge, damage increased from Lightning Charge is additive.
details: Increases chance to gain Lightning Charges
Increases amount of %Damage provided per each stack of Lightning Charge
Increases max stacks of buff (up to 4)
Grants flat Attack and now increases %Crit Damage

primary.name: Call of Cygnus
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, awakened Empress appears\n[Passive Effect: All stats with a direct AP investment increase by 15%]
details: Skill is a passive, the active effect does nothing except displays an animation

primary.name: Cygnus Knights' Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 300 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for 3 secs
details: Unaffected by Combat Orders

primary.name: Annihilate
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 60, Max Enemies Hit: 1, Damage: 335%, Number of Attacks: 7
primary.desc: Unleashes a shark that lunges forward at one enemy
details: Attack does not generate stacks of Lightning Charge

When used first, can be linked with all skills except
  • Links to more quickly
Cast action cannot be cancelled when linked into while mid-air

primary.name: Thunderbolt
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 75, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 320%, Number of Attacks: 5
primary.desc: Slams down an anchor on enemies in front of you
details:
When used first, can be linked with all skills except
  • Links to more quickly

primary.name: Typhoon
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 49, can be used when Lightning Charge stack is 2
Uses all Lightning Charge stacks, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 320%, Number of Attacks: 5. When used at max Lightning Charge stacks, Damage: +100% points
Damage: +3% per Lightning Charge used, Buff Duration: 90 sec
However, this skill doesn't generate Lightning Charges.
Cooldown: 12 sec
details: Now requires 2 or more stacks to activate
Increases %Damage, Number of Attacks, and Max Enemies Hit of attack
Increases %p Damage bonus when used at max stacks of Lightning Charges
Increases %Damage provided from buff per Lightning Charge
Now able to link with more quickly
Cooldown of attack is reduced

primary.name: Arc Charger
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 80, makes an additional hit that is 70% of the final damage for all attacks
primary.desc: While active, each hit deals an additional strike with reduced %Final Damage
details: Does not apply to summoning skills and 5th Job Common Skills
Functions similar to Shadow Partner

primary.name: Speed Infusion
primary.shortDesc: HP Cost: 40, MP Cost: 40, Duration: 300 sec, Attack Speed: +2\n[Passive Effect: Sea Wave Damage: +100% points]
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %p Damage of

primary.name: Knuckle Expert
primary.shortDesc: Knuckle Mastery: +70%. Attack Power: +30\nFinal Damage: +15%, Critical Damage: +15%
details: Increases %Weapon Mastery provided
Now grants flat Attack and increases %Final Damage and %Crit Damage

primary.name: Electrify
primary.shortDesc: Max HP: 20%, Avoidability: +20%, Knockback Resistance: +60%, Damage Intake: -20%

primary.name: Thunder God
primary.shortDesc: Lightning Charge Chance: +30%, Max Stacks: 1\nIgnore Enemy Defense: +9% per Lightning Charge\nCritical Rate: +10%, Critical Damage: +15%
details: Increases chance to gain Lightning Charges
Increases max stacks of Lightning Charges (up to 5)
Increases amount of %Ignore DEF provided from each stack of Lightning Charge
Increases %Crit Damage and now increases %Crit Rate

hyperActive.name: Primal Bolt
hyperActive.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 200, Duration: 30 sec, skill doesn't consume MP while active
For every Lightning Charge, Damage: +4%, Ignore Enemy Defense: +10%
When using Link Mastery skill, ignores required Lightning Charges and doesn't consume Lightning Charges, and Gale's cooldown isn't applied.
Decreases Link Mastery skill's cooldown when linking skill while active
Sea Wave: Decreases 1.5 sec each up to 9 sec when linking
Shark Torpedo: Decreases 0.5 sec each up to 2 sec when linking
Lightning God Spear Strike: Decreases 0.5 sec each up to 3 sec when linking
Cooldown: 120 sec
hyperActive.desc: While active, skills do not consume MP and Link Mastery skills can be used while ignoring required stacks of Lightning Charge to activate
details: Stacks of Lightning Charge will not be consumed when Link Mastery skills are used
Cooldown will not be applied when using
Each stack of Lightning Charge will provide increased %Ignore DEF and %Final Damage
Linking skills will reduce the cooldowns of , , and

hyperActive.name: Deep Rising
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 350, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 860%, Number of Attacks: 7, invincible during casting motion\nCooldown: 45 sec
hyperActive.desc: Releases the king of the sea to crash down on enemies
details:
When used first, can be linked with all skills except
  • Links to more quickly
You are invincible while casting
Unaffected by cooldown reduction

hyperActive.name: Glory of the Guardians
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nOnly Cygnus Knights and Mihile in the party receive the effect\nCooldown: 120 sec

fifthMain.name: Lightning Cascade
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, Grants Final Damage +27% for 52 sec. Initial Damage: 650%, Max Enemies Hit: 5, Number of Attacks: 6. Send forth a lightning bolt.
The damage it deals decreases with each enemy it attacks, and it can hit up to 4 nearby enemies in a row
When only one bolt triggers, it becomes a more powerful version, dealing 880% damage 7 times.
Lightning Spawn Cooldown: 3 sec
Passive Effect: when you attack during the Lightning Cascade cooldown, 1 lightning bolt activates if there are normal monsters nearby. Cooldown: 6 sec. Active and Passive Effects cannot trigger simultaneously.
Skill Cooldown: 120 sec
fifthMain.desc: While active, increases %Final Damage and your attacks creates a chain of lightning that bounces to nearby enemies
details: [Passive]: While buff is not active, periodically while attacking, a lightning bolt may strike if there are normal monsters nearby
The lightning damage is reduced for each enemy it spreads to
Deals increased %Damage if only one enemy is hit
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Shark Torpedo
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 500, Consumes 2 Lightning Charges.
Fires a deadly spirit-shark that deals 2310% damage 7 times to up to 15 enemies.
When Lightning Charge is at max stacks, Damage: +200% points
Cooldown: 8 sec
fifthMain.desc: Releases a shark that rips through enemies in front of you
details:
Consumes 2 stacks of Lightning Charge
  • When used at max stacks, attack deals increased %p Damage
When used first, can be linked with all skills except
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Lightning God Spear Strike
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 500
A divine trident is summoned after 8 linked attacks land successfully.
Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 330%, Number of Attacks: 6
Afterwards, activates Lightning at set intervals 4 times, which hits up to 8 enemies for 440% damage 7 times.
Cooldown: 7 sec
fifthMain.desc: Launch a trident to strike nearby enemies
details: Trident is prepared and can be used after linking 8 skills once off cooldown
The trident deals damage as it launches up and after it launches up
Right-clicking the skill will toggle Auto Use ON/OFF that automatically launches a trident when it is not on cooldown
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Lightning Spear Multistrike
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, Duration: 60 sec, Max Combo Attacks: 12
Combo Attack: Max Enemies Hit: 4, Damage: 1430%, Number of Attacks: 5. When hit, Max Lightnings: 3, Max Enemies Hit: 3, Damage: 1555%, Number of Attacks: 4. Multiple lightning bolt flash.
Final combo attacks up to 7 enemies with 1990% damage 7 times. When hit, activates large lightning bolts 3 times, attacking up to 8 enemies with 2145% damage 6 times.
Cooldown: 120 sec.
fifthMain.desc: Strike violently around you and causes lightning to strike from above
details: Can be used up to 12 times before going on cooldown
The final strike deals increased %Damage
When used first, can be linked with all skills except
Cast action cannot be cancelled when linked into while mid-air
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

masteryCore.name: 1st Mastery Node
details: Requires enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Annihilate
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 80, Max Enemies Hit: 3, Damage: 470%, Number of Attacks: 7\nCreate a Lightning Brand on enemies hit that lasts 90 sec.
details: Unlocked with 1st Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: Thunder Bolt
masteryCore.shortDesc: When attacking Lightning Brand marked enemies with a direct attack skill (excluding HEXA Annihilate and Tidal Crash), Lightning Strike hits the enemy. Damage: 380%, Number of Attacks: 3\nCreate a massive thunderbolt instead when using linked skills (excluding Sea Wave, Lightning Spear Multistrike's linked attack, and Thunder Wall Sea Wave). Damage: 340%, Number of Attacks: 5\nBoss Damage: +40%, Ignore Defense: +20%
details: Unlocked with 1st Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: 2nd Mastery Node
details: Requires enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Thunderbolt
masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 84, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 515%, Number of Attacks: 5
Thunder Slash: MP Cost: 90, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 545%, Number of Attacks: 5
Creates a Sea Wave in the direction that the character is facing. Sea Waves created by Thunder Slash are unaffected by cooldowns.
Cooldown: 6 sec
[Passive Effect: Lightning Strike's Massive Thunderbolt Damage: +360%p]
details: Unlocked with 2nd Mastery Node

originSkill.name: Thunder Wall Sea Wave
originSkill.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1200, invincible during casting
Shock Wave that attacks up to 15 enemies with 1390% damage 5 times is triggered 32 times,
then Shock Wave that attacks with 1370% damage 7 times is triggered 62 times
Cooldown: 360 sec

meta: Thunder Breaker is STR warrior class part of the Cygnus Knights. Thunder Breakers are known for their unique combo attack playstyle
